documentation.content:
[View Workload Details](https://console.cloud.google.com/kubernetes/deployment/${CLUSTER_LOCATION}/${CLUSTER_NAME}/${NAMESPACE}/${WORKLOAD_NAME}/observability?project=${PROJECT_ID}).
- If alerts tend to be false positive or noisy, consider visiting the alert policy page and changing the threshold or duration. [Alerting policies documentation](https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/alerts/concepts-indepth)

conditionPrometheusQueryLanguage.query:
sum by (http_method, http_route, http_status_code)(
  rate(http_server_duration_milliseconds_count{project_id="${PROJECT_ID}", location="${CLUSTER_LOCATION}", cluster="${CLUSTER_NAME}", namespace="${NAMESPACE}", job="${JOB}", http_status_code=~"5.."}[5m]))
/
on(http_method, http_route) group_left
sum by (http_method, http_route)(
  rate(http_server_duration_milliseconds_count{project_id="${PROJECT_ID}", location="${CLUSTER_LOCATION}", cluster="${CLUSTER_NAME}", namespace="${NAMESPACE}", job="${JOB}"}[5m]))
> .05
